page.title: 19PARK VIEW THURCASTON
page.content: On Anstey Lane, Thurcaston, are the stables of Mr. and Mrs. McDonald. The stables hold as many as 90 horses and ponies, some of which belong to local people. My family keeps our horses there. There are 6 fields and paddocks, an indoor arena, outdoor menage and 'The County Saddlery' which is a shop that sells anything you might need for a horse. A 1 hour riding lesson will cost Â£3.50 for juniors or Â£4 for seniors and a Cross Country Lesson will cost between Â£5 and Â£10. The facilities are used by many people, on the day we visited a group of physically handicapped children were there. Each week a group of 7-11 year olds from Highcliffe Primary School ride as part of their Outdoor Pursuits program.
